title: Chicken, baby corn and mangetout with noodles
ingredients: ['200-250g medium egg noodles', '2 tsp toasted sesame oil', '350g skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into thin slices', '1 egg white', '2 tsp cornflour', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '3 spring onions, cut diagonally into 2cm pieces', '250g baby corn, halved lengthways', '250g mangetout, halved lengthways', '1 red pepper, cut into strips', '1 yellow pepper, cut into strips', '5 tbsp yellow bean sauce', '150ml vegetable or chicken stock, made with a stock cube']
